```{r}
X = matrix(0,9,9)
X[1,] = sample(1:9)

for (i in 1:2){
   X[i+1,4:6]<-X[i,1:3]
   X[i+1,7:9]<-X[i,4:6]
   X[i+1,1:3]<-X[i,7:9]
}
t=1:3
for (c in c(0,3)){
  for (k in c(0,3,6)){
    for (j in c(0,1)){
      X[t+3+c,2+j+k]=X[t+c,1+j+k]
      X[t+3+c,1+k]=X[t+c,3+k]}
  }
}

X
```
